sentences.en: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.cn: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.en: Davies is still raw but his potential shows.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯还是新人，但已经显示出了他的潜力。

sentences.en: Exploitable raw materials were in short supply.
sentences.cn: 可开发利用的原材料供应不足。

sentences.en: grated raw carrots
sentences.cn: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.en: Half of it is burned and half of it is raw.
sentences.cn: 一半烧焦了，另一半还是生的。

sentences.en: He also wanted to see Bangladesh in the raw.
sentences.cn: 他也想看看原生态的孟加拉国是什么样子。

sentences.en: He possessed a raw energy allied to a feeling of something special.
sentences.cn: 他粗犷豪放，给人一种特殊的感觉。

sentences.en: I think women have a raw deal.
sentences.cn: 我认为妇女受到了不公正的待遇。

sentences.en: In its raw state, cocoa is very bitter.
sentences.cn: 未经加工的可可豆味道很苦。

sentences.en: It exposes capitalism in the raw.
sentences.cn: 它暴露了资本主义的本来面目。

sentences.en: nature in the raw.
sentences.cn: 未经雕琢的自然

sentences.en: Once they cleared the housetops, the wind was raw and biting.
sentences.cn: 他们清扫完屋顶后，寒风刺骨。

sentences.en: Pecan nuts are delicious both raw and cooked.
sentences.cn: 美洲山核桃不论生的还是熟的都很好吃。

sentences.en: raw meat
sentences.cn: 生肉

sentences.en: raw sugar
sentences.cn: 原糖

sentences.en: Raw-steel production by the nation's mills decreased 2.1% last week.
sentences.cn: 上周该国钢铁厂的原钢产量下降了2.1%。

sentences.en: The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
sentences.cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

sentences.en: They feel that Quebec is getting a raw deal.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得魁北克省受到了不公平的待遇。

sentences.en: This is nature in the raw.
sentences.cn: 这是自然的原生态。

sentences.en: Use separate chopping boards for raw meats, cooked meats, vegetables and salads.
sentences.cn: 切生肉、熟肉、蔬菜和拌色拉的青菜时要使用不同的切菜板。

sentences.en: We import raw materials and energy and export mainly in-dustrial products.
sentences.cn: 我们进口原材料和能源，主要出口工业产品。

words.tran_cn: 生的,未煮过的;无经验的

phrases.phrase: don't come the raw prawn with me
phrases.tran_cn: (澳，非正式)不要蒙我；不要愚弄我
原生态可燃气体；未净化的气体；脏煤气
原料乳；生牛奶；未消毒牛奶

trans.tran_cn: 生的，自然状态的，强大的，擦伤的，不熟练的，寒冷的，质朴的
